channel.title: Articles on developing nobackend apps
channel.description: Articles about Firebase, Knockout, javascript and nobackend development

item.title: Simple Signup and Login with Firebase and Knockoutjs
item.description: In this tutorial you will learn how to set up an effective registration and authentication process for your web app using just Firebase, Knockout and Twitter Bootstrap

item.title: The Good and Bad of Firebase Syncing
The Good and Bad of Firebase Syncing - A Follow Up
item.description: A test of firebase syncing that shows how data can be lost when a client becomes disconnected from firebase
